de.saxsys.jfx.mvvm.utils

Class SizeBindings

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.saxsys.jfx.mvvm.utils.SizeBindings
  • Deprecated. 
    Use SizeBindingsBuilder instead. This class is deprecated because the usage of overloaded methods for different types of components isn't flexible enough.

    @Deprecated
public final class SizeBindings
extends Object
    This class is an helper for binding two components to the same size. It can handle Pane,Node, ScrollPane, Rectangle, Control
    Author:
    alexander.casall
